titlestmt.titleproper: Construction Records of the United States Army, 1931-1932
Construction Records of the United States Army,
titlestmt.author: Processed by Staff.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Construction Records of the United States Army, 1931-1932
did.abstract: Bids, contracts, specifications, blueprints, correspondence, financial records and forms relating to construction, 1931-1932. Construction of an Airways Operation Building and an Air Corps Hangar at the present Davis-Monthan Air Force Base in Tucson, Ariz.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Construction Records of the United States Army (AZ 112). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Construction of an Airways Operation Building and an Air Corps Hangar at the present Davis-Monthan Air Force Base in Tucson, Ariz.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Bids, contracts, specifications, blueprints, correspondence, financial records and forms relating to construction, 1931-1932.
